com.soa.console.policy.renderer

Class AbstractOperationalPolicyRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.console.policy.renderer.AbstractOperationalPolicyRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OperationalPolicyRenderer, PolicyRenderer

    public abstract class AbstractOperationalPolicyRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements OperationalPolicyRenderer
    Abstract convenience class that can be extended to simplify OperationPolicyRenderer construction. Implements shortcut methods for getting and updating policy configuration.
